   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to QuickLines's documentation!
======================================

A simple emission line profile fitting package developed as part of the CodeAstro Workshop 2024.

This code can take in the wavelength, flux, and errors of a 1D spectrum and return line flux, continuum flux density, and velocity dispersion.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   quicklines.rst
